oai_dc:dc.dc:title: To assess the technical and economic problems associated with the production of a) protected crops and b) apples
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
Fruit and berries
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A review has been produced of three aspects of organic horticultural production, namely protected cropping, top fruit and vegetable transplants. For each sector of the industry the practical problems have been discussed particularly those that may relate to conversion from conventional production and an attempt has been made to analyse the economic performance. In an area where there are few sources of published information, the economic assesments have of necessity been based on the experiences of a small number of growers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} To assess the technical and economic problems associated with the production of a) protected crops and b) apples. Runs 1995 - 1996. Project Leader(s): Unspecified, , ADAS.
